metadata.Description: Artificial intelligence techniques that can generate new content, such as images, music, or text.

entities: research and development of renewable energy technologies

level 1.Description: Generative AI implements sustainable energy solutions by optimizing energy usage and reducing waste.

level 1.Object: research and development of renewable energy technologies
level 1.Description: Generative AI funds the research and development of renewable energy technologies to accelerate the transition to sustainable energy sources.
Generative AI focuses on energy efficiency to minimize energy consumption and promote sustainable energy practices.
Generative AI is used in smart grid systems to optimize energy distribution and enable efficient energy management.
Generative AI partners with clean energy companies to develop innovative solutions for sustainable energy generation and utilization.
Generative AI contributes to reducing carbon emissions by optimizing energy systems and promoting clean energy adoption.
Generative AI monitors energy consumption patterns to identify areas for improvement and optimize energy usage.
Generative AI targets energy efficiency improvements to achieve sustainable energy goals and reduce environmental impact.
Generative AI addresses energy poverty by developing affordable and sustainable energy solutions for underserved communities.

level 2.Subject: energy efficiency
level 2.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

level 2.Subject: energy efficiency
level 2.Description: Energy efficiency employs energy audits to identify energy-saving opportunities and optimize energy use.

level 2.Subject: energy poverty indices
level 2.Description: Energy poverty indices implement energy access programs to provide affordable and reliable energy services to underserved communities.

level 2.Subject: energy poverty indices
level 2.Description: Energy poverty indices focus on improving energy affordability to ensure that all individuals can access and afford essential energy services.

level 3.Subject: energy storage
level 3.Description: Energy storage addresses the issue of intermittency in renewable energy sources by storing excess energy for use during periods of low generation.

level 3.Subject: energy markets
level 3.Description: Energy markets address the issue of energy access by ensuring the availability and affordability of energy sources for all segments of society.

level 3.Subject: renewable energy certificates
level 3.Description: Renewable energy certificates are implemented by the Energy Efficiency Policy to promote the use of renewable energy sources.

level 3.Subject: energy efficiency
level 3.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

subelement_relations.Description: Deep learning is a subfield of generative AI that focuses on training artificial neural networks with multiple layers to learn and make predictions from large amounts of data. It is particularly effective in tasks such as image and speech recognition.

Neural networks are a key component of generative AI, as they are used to model and simulate the behavior of the human brain. They consist of interconnected nodes (neurons) that process and transmit information to generate outputs.

Machine learning is an essential aspect of generative AI, as it enables the system to automatically learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed. It involves the development of algorithms and models that can analyze and interpret data to make predictions or take actions.

Natural language processing (NLP) is a subfield of generative AI that focuses on enabling computers to understand, interpret, and generate human language. It involves techniques such as text analysis, sentiment analysis, and language translation.

Computer vision is a subfield of generative AI that deals with enabling computers to understand and interpret visual information from images or videos. It involves tasks such as object recognition, image classification, and image generation.
